No I think until he became Thrust Waspinator's spark
was in his head (I can assume he was a special model
Predicon because they never showed where his spark was
just where other bots had their sparks).  This could
explain his ability to get blown up.  The Spark is
everything.  If it dies so does everything.  Beside's
if logic were in the head you wouldn't need it to
revive Waspinator, but they never threw it out as a
useless waist of power.

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> OOC:
> 
> Both I'd say. They can "survive" without either
> endlessly (they just can't
> do anything). Logic and memory is in the head actual
> "spark" (or whatever
> passes for it in BW) is in the body.
> 
>
